entry.title: JET H1844 - Brake Cylinder Hone (3/4 2-1/2 Inch Range) H1844
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Brake Tools
Price: 28.91

[shortdesc]

Brake Cylinder Hone

  • Designed for fast accurate deglazing of cylinders
  • For cylinder diameters 3/4" – 2-1/2"
  • Adjustment plate ensures stones contact cylinder wall with equal pressure
  • Adjustable spring tension to select desired pressure
  • Fits 1/4" or 3/8" drills
  • 220 grit stones remove glaze quickly and leave a smooth finish
  • Replacement stones H1843B (set of 3)
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Product Type Brake Tools
    Size 1/4 Inch

    Extra Product Information

  • 220 grit stones

entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Segments
Price: 84.30

[shortdesc]
  • Surface grinding segments are generally used to grind flat stock or flat surfaces within a workpiece
  • The segment moves over the workpiece in a flat plane or vice versa
  • Applications can vary from heavy, rapid stock removal to precision tolerance operations.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Medalist
    Diameter 6 Inch
    Grit 30
    Height 1-1/2 Inch
    Width 5 Inch
    Product Type Segments

    Product Information

  • High-performance, blue-colored ceramic alumina abrasive for fastest stock removal, maximum productivity, and cool cutting
  • High-performance bond provides enhanced segment life
  • Self-sharpening abrasive for less burn on part
  • Induced porosity offers a cool, free cut and excellent chip/coolant flow

entry.title: Carborundum Crystolon 09128 - Crystolon (Silicon Carbide) Benchstones Combination Grit (Bulk) 6X2X1 05539509128
entry.summary:
Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Sharpening Sticks & Stones
Price: 28.38

[shortdesc]
  • Benchstones are great for hand dimensioning and sharpening of all types of knives, plane blades, chisels, scrapers, or any other tool that needs a flat, sharp edge
  • Choose one sharpening stone or a sequence of sharpening stones to quickly restore the cutting edge on all straight-edge tools.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Line Crystolon
    Diameter 6 Inch
    Height 1 Inch
    Width 2 Inch
    Product Type Sharpening Sticks & Stones

    Product Information

  • Sharp, silicon carbide abrasive provides enhanced cutting action and fast stock removal
  • dark gray in color
  • These fast-cutting stones are used to sharpen edges on tools to moderate tolerances quickly
  • Vitrified bond provides long life and excellent form holding
  • The use of oil with sharpening stones enhances the sharpening action and minimizes the clogging of the stone's surface
    		•

Vendor: Carborundum
Type: Dressing & Finishing

    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Carborundum
    Grit 40
    Product Type Dressing & Finishing

    Product Information

  • Vitrified bond provides excellent conformability
  • Aluminum oxide dressing sticks work best on cBN grinding wheels, but can also be used on diamond grinding wheels
  • Clean, open, and reshape grinding wheels to maximize grinding performance
